text: Fatkhullo Fatkhuloev (; born 24 March 1990) is a Tajikistani footballer who plays as a Winger for Indian Super League club Chennaiyin FC and the Tajikistan national team. ==Career== ===Club=== On 30 December 2017, Fatkhuloev signed a one-year contract with Indonesian Liga 1 side Persela Lamongan, but was released by the club on 5 February 2018. On 19 July 2019, Fatkhuloev left FC Istiklol to join Uzbekistan Super League club FK Buxoro. On 12 February 2020, Fatkhuloev signed for FK Khujand. On 15 October 2020 , Fatkhuloev joined Indian Super League club Chennaiyin FC on a one year deal. ===International=== Fatkhuloev also joined the 2007 FIFA U-17 World Cup held in South Korea. ==Career
